## ExcludeOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExcludeOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attributes](./core-types.excludeoptions.attributes.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to use the attributes provided by this extension |
|  [inputRules](./core-types.excludeoptions.inputrules.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's inputRules |
|  [keymaps](./core-types.excludeoptions.keymaps.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's keymaps |
|  [nodeView](./core-types.excludeoptions.nodeview.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's nodeView |
|  [pasteRules](./core-types.excludeoptions.pasterules.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's pasteRules |
|  [plugin](./core-types.excludeoptions.plugin.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's plugin |
|  [ssr](./core-types.excludeoptions.ssr.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to use the SSR component when not in a DOM environment |
|  [styles](./core-types.excludeoptions.styles.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to exclude the extension's styles. |
|  [suggesters](./core-types.excludeoptions.suggesters.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to include the suggestions plugin configuration for the extension. |
